steps.description: Save the document.

steps.name: Launch Paint Application
steps.description: Start the Paint application
steps.verification: Paint window is opened with title 'Untitled - Paint'

steps.name: Create New Canvas
steps.description: Create a new canvas in Paint application

actions.expected_result: New window with title 'Untitled - Paint' appears

steps.verification: Window title is updated to 'Untitled - Paint'

steps.name: Draw Rectangle for House Base
steps.description: Draw a rectangle for the house base using Paint application

actions.expected_result: Rectangle tool is selected in toolbar

steps.verification: Rectangle tool icon is highlighted in toolbar

steps.name: Draw Rectangle for House Walls
steps.description: Draw two rectangles for the house walls using Paint application

actions.expected_result: Second rectangle tool is selected in toolbar

steps.verification: Two rectangle tools are highlighted in toolbar

steps.name: Draw Rectangle for House Roof
steps.description: Draw a triangle for the house roof using Paint application

actions.expected_result: Triangle tool is selected in toolbar

steps.verification: Triangle tool icon is highlighted in toolbar

steps.name: Draw Door and Windows
steps.description: Draw a rectangle for the door and two small rectangles for the windows using Paint application

actions.expected_result: Third rectangle tool is selected in toolbar

steps.verification: Three rectangle tools are highlighted in toolbar

steps.name: Draw Final Touches
steps.description: Add final touches to the house drawing using Paint application

actions.expected_result: User has enough time to add final touches

steps.verification: House drawing is complete with final touches

steps.name: Launch Paint Program
steps.description: Open the Microsoft Paint application.
steps.verification: Window title is 'Microsoft Paint' and has a canvas

steps.name: Create New Canvas
steps.description: Create a new, blank canvas in Paint.
steps.verification: Canvas has a white background and no content

steps.name: Draw Rectangle for House
steps.description: Use the rectangle tool to draw the house's walls.

actions.expected_result: Rectangle tool is selected and cursor changes

steps.verification: Rectangle outline appears on canvas, with handles for resizing

steps.name: Draw Roof of House
steps.description: Use the rectangle tool to draw the house's roof.

actions.expected_result: Roof is drawn above the house

steps.verification: Roof is a triangle shape, with edges and corners

steps.name: Draw Door of House
steps.description: Use the rectangle tool to draw the house's door.

actions.expected_result: Door is drawn on the front of the house

steps.verification: Door is a rectangle shape, with edges and corners

steps.name: Draw Windows of House
steps.description: Use the ellipse tool to draw the house's windows.

actions.expected_result: Ellipse tool is selected and cursor changes

steps.verification: Elliptical shapes appear on the house, with edges and corners

steps.name: Save Drawing as Image
steps.description: Save the drawing as an image file.

actions.expected_result: Drawing is saved as house.png file

steps.verification: File 'house.png' exists in the same directory

steps.name: Draw door and windows
